amendment.description: An amendment numbered 77 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit the use of funds by the Office of Management and Budget to consider the Social Cost of Greenhouse Gases (SC-GHG) in the development and implementation of budgets, federal procurement processes, or environmental reviews.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.
